name: Basic Land Arts
desc: Land Arts specialize in forming and shaping the earth, whether that be a localized earthquake, creating difficult footing, or forcing up walls of solid earth. These basic Land abilities enable other Land Disciplines and provide a strong foundation for all practitioners.

name: Basic Mountain Arts
desc: Mountain Arts specialize in moving earthen materials, typically in a weaponized way. These abilities create avalanches, fling stones like a catapult, and allow fine control over earthen materials. These basic Mountain abilities enable other Mountain Disciplines and can be the first stone in a mighty avalanche.

name: Basic Tide Arts
desc: Tide Arts specialize in controlling liquid water pushing and pulling it just like the tides, creating dangerously slick terrain, aquatic shields, and powerful blasts of water. These basic Tide abilities enable other Tide Disciplines and can build into a crashing wave.

name: Basic Tundra Arts
desc: Tundra Arts specialize in controlling ice and snow, creating a frozen wasteland to entrap foes with sleet and snow. These basic Tundra abilities enable other Tundra Disciplines and can cause even the most stubborn of foes to chill out.

name: Basic Blaze Arts
desc: Blaze Arts specialize in creating and harnessing flames, setting the battlefield alight and burning foes in their path. These basic Blaze abilities enable other Blaze Disciplines and can start a raging fire.
